title: Top 10 trending phones of week 47
description: A few interesting debuts came in week 48, but the trending chart since has the same familiar Samsung duo on top. The Galaxy A55 remains the most popular smartphone in our database, followed by the S24 Ultra. [#InlinePriceWidget, 12824, 1#] The podium is once more completed by the Redmi Note 13 Pro, while the iPhone 16 Pro Max kept climbing up the ranks and is now fourth. Oppo's Find X8 Pro made its international debut, which helped propell it to fifth position, just ahead of the Redmi Note 13. Samsung Galaxy A15 follows in seventh, while the Realme GT 7 Pro made it on the...

html:
A few interesting debuts came in week 48, but the trending chart since has the same familiar Samsung duo on top. The Galaxy A55 remains the most popular smartphone in our database, followed by the S24 Ultra.

Samsung Galaxy A55

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
128GB 8GB RAM$ 299.99C$ 442.00
256GB 8GB RAM$ 329.00C$ 479.99
Show all prices

The podium is once more completed by the Redmi Note 13 Pro, while the iPhone 16 Pro Max kept climbing up the ranks and is now fourth.

Oppo's Find X8 Pro made its international debut, which helped propell it to fifth position, just ahead of the Redmi Note 13.

Samsung Galaxy A15 follows in seventh, while the Realme GT 7 Pro made it on the chart in eight.

A Galaxy pair opened this edition of the top 10 and another one closes it - the Galaxy A35 is ninth, while the Galaxy A16 5G is tenth.
